subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shaquille O’Neal had 14 points and 16 rebounds, and Steve Nash 19 points and 14 assists Sunday, helping the Phoenix Suns to a rugged 94-87 victory against the visiting San Antonio Spurs.
snippet: Shaquille O’Neal had 14 points and 16 rebounds, and Steve Nash 19 points and 14 assists Sunday, helping the Phoenix Suns to a rugged 94-87 victory against the visiting San Antonio Spurs.
